results.title: Elucidation of the mechanism of action of pinitol against pressure overload-induced cardiac hypertrophy and fibrosis in an animal model of aortic stenosis.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@Cardiac hypertrophy@@@ was produced in Sprague-Dawley @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ by abdominal @DISEASE_Aortic_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001018 @@@aortic@@@ constriction and treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (15 mg/kg) or @CHEMICAL_pinitol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C021730 @@@pinitol@@@ (5, 10, and 20 mg/kg).

citations.NLM: Hu X, Zhu Y, L V X, Feng Z. Elucidation of the mechanism of action of pinitol against pressure overload-induced cardiac hypertrophy and fibrosis in an animal model of aortic stenosis. Biosci Biotechnol Biochem. 2021 Feb 24;85(3):643-655. PMID: 33589894
citations.BibTeX: @article{33589894, title={Elucidation of the mechanism of action of pinitol against pressure overload-induced cardiac hypertrophy and fibrosis in an animal model of aortic stenosis.}, author={Hu X and Zhu Y and L V X and Feng Z}, journal={Biosci Biotechnol Biochem}, volume={85}, number={3}, pages={643-655}}

results.title: Lisinopril reduces cardiac hypertrophy and mortality in rats with aortocaval fistula.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ reduces @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ and mortality in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @DISEASE_Fistula @DISEASE_MESH:D005402 @@@aortocaval fistula@@@.

citations.NLM: Oka T, Nishimura H, Ueyama M, Kubota J, Kawamura K. Lisinopril reduces cardiac hypertrophy and mortality in rats with aortocaval fistula. Eur J Pharmacol. 1993 Mar 30;234(1):55-60. PMID: 8386093
citations.BibTeX: @article{8386093, title={Lisinopril reduces cardiac hypertrophy and mortality in rats with aortocaval fistula.}, author={Oka T and Nishimura H and Ueyama M and Kubota J and Kawamura K}, journal={Eur J Pharmacol}, volume={234}, number={1}, pages={55-60}}

results.title: Cardiac hypertrophy in experimental hypertension: interaction of the sodium ion, blood pressure and lisinopril.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@Cardiac hypertrophy@@@ in experimental @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@: interaction of the @CHEMICAL_Sodium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012964 @@@sodium@@@ ion, blood pressure and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

citations.NLM: Fernandez D, Snedden W, Fernandez PG, Nath C, Vasdev S, Triggle CR, Lee C. Cardiac hypertrophy in experimental hypertension: interaction of the sodium ion, blood pressure and lisinopril. Can J Cardiol. 1988 Jan-Feb;4(1):44-8. PMID: 2834032

results.title: Effects of lisinopril upon cardiac hypertrophy, central and peripheral hemodynamics and neurohumoral factors in spontaneously hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ upon @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@, central and peripheral hemodynamics and neurohumoral factors in spontaneously @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Nishimura H, Kubota J, Okabe M, Ueyama M, Kawamura K. Effects of lisinopril upon cardiac hypertrophy, central and peripheral hemodynamics and neurohumoral factors in spontaneously hypertensive rats. J Hypertens. 1992 May;10(5):431-6. PMID: 1317903

results.title: Diverse effects of Ace inhibitors and angiotensin II receptor antagonists on prevention of cardiac hypertrophy and collagen distribution in spontaneously hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: This study has compared the effects of two structurally different angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors (ACEis) such as @CHEMICAL_zofenopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:C044958 @@@zofenopril@@@ (@CHEMICAL_zofenopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:C044958 @@@Zof@@@, with sulfhydrylic group) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lis@@@, with carboxylic group) and an angiotensin II AT(1) receptor antagonist (@CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@, Los) on the prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ and collagen distribution in spontaneously @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ (SHRs).

citations.NLM: Gagnon C, Legault F, Geraldes P, Tanguay JF, Lambert C. Diverse effects of Ace inhibitors and angiotensin II receptor antagonists on prevention of cardiac hypertrophy and collagen distribution in spontaneously hypertensive rats. Int J Cardiol. 2004 Dec;97(3):373-81. PMID: 15561321
citations.BibTeX: @article{15561321, title={Diverse effects of Ace inhibitors and angiotensin II receptor antagonists on prevention of cardiac hypertrophy and collagen distribution in spontaneously hypertensive rats.}, author={Gagnon C and Legault F and Geraldes P and Tanguay JF and Lambert C}, journal={Int J Cardiol}, volume={97}, number={3}, pages={373-81}}

results.title: Effects of lisinopril on experimental ischemia in rats. Influence of infarct size.
results.text_hl: This study aimed to analyze the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on mortality rate, cardiac function, degree of @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with different @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ sizes.

citations.NLM: Zornoff LA, Matsubara BB, Matsubara LS, Paiva SA, Tornero MT, Spadaro J. Effects of lisinopril on experimental ischemia in rats. Influence of infarct size. Arq Bras Cardiol. 1999 Oct;73(4):359-72. PMID: 10754590
citations.BibTeX: @article{10754590, title={Effects of lisinopril on experimental ischemia in rats. Influence of infarct size.}, author={Zornoff LA and Matsubara BB and Matsubara LS and Paiva SA and Tornero MT and Spadaro J}, journal={Arq Bras Cardiol}, volume={73}, number={4}, pages={359-72}}

results.title: Comparative antihypertensive and renoprotective effects of telmisartan and lisinopril after long-term treatment in hypertensive diabetic rats.
results.text_hl: Compared with the untreated @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ SHRs, @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ was significantly reduced after treatment with both doses of @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@ and with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

citations.NLM: Wienen W, Richard S, Champeroux P, Audeval-Gerard C. Comparative antihypertensive and renoprotective effects of telmisartan and lisinopril after long-term treatment in hypertensive diabetic rats. J Renin Angiotensin Aldosterone Syst. 2001 Mar;2(1):31-6. PMID: 11881063
citations.BibTeX: @article{11881063, title={Comparative antihypertensive and renoprotective effects of telmisartan and lisinopril after long-term treatment in hypertensive diabetic rats.}, author={Wienen W and Richard S and Champeroux P and Audeval-Gerard C}, journal={J Renin Angiotensin Aldosterone Syst}, volume={2}, number={1}, pages={31-6}}

results.title: Significant role of the increase in renin-angiotensin system in cardiac hypertrophy and renal glomerular sclerosis in double transgenic tsukuba hypertensive mice carrying both human renin and angiotensinogen genes.
results.text_hl: From these findings, it was demonstrated that RAS was playing a significant role in @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ and @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@renal disorders@@@ of @SPECIES_1652145 @@@THM@@@ and that @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ had inhibitory effects on @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ and @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@renal glomerular sclerosis@@@ by inhibiting RAS.

citations.NLM: Kai T, Kino H, Sugimura K, Shimada S, Kurooka A, Akamatsu K, Takenaka T, Fukamizu A, Murakami K, Ishikawa K, Katori R. Significant role of the increase in renin-angiotensin system in cardiac hypertrophy and renal glomerular sclerosis in double transgenic tsukuba hypertensive mice carrying both human renin and angiotensinogen genes. Clin Exp Hypertens. 1998 May;20(4):439-49. PMID: 9607405
citations.BibTeX: @article{9607405, title={Significant role of the increase in renin-angiotensin system in cardiac hypertrophy and renal glomerular sclerosis in double transgenic tsukuba hypertensive mice carrying both human renin and angiotensinogen genes.}, author={Kai T and Kino H and Sugimura K and Shimada S and Kurooka A and Akamatsu K and Takenaka T and Fukamizu A and Murakami K and Ishikawa K and Katori R}, journal={Clin Exp Hypertens}, volume={20}, number={4}, pages={439-49}}

results.title: A comparison of the effect of angiotensin converting enzyme inhibition and angiotensin II receptor antagonism on the structural changes associated with hypertension in rat small arteries.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: At age 20 weeks @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ had attenuated blood pressure development and prevented @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ (but not @DISEASE_Hypertrophy @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@vascular hypertrophy@@@) in a dose-dependent manner.

citations.NLM: Shaw LM, George PR, Oldham AA, Heagerty AM. A comparison of the effect of angiotensin converting enzyme inhibition and angiotensin II receptor antagonism on the structural changes associated with hypertension in rat small arteries. J Hypertens. 1995 Oct;13(10):1135-43. PMID: 8586805
citations.BibTeX: @article{8586805, title={A comparison of the effect of angiotensin converting enzyme inhibition and angiotensin II receptor antagonism on the structural changes associated with hypertension in rat small arteries.}, author={Shaw LM and George PR and Oldham AA and Heagerty AM}, journal={J Hypertens}, volume={13}, number={10}, pages={1135-43}}

results.title: Effect of an angiotensin II receptor antagonist, TCV-116, on rat carotid artery neointimal formation after balloon injury.
results.text_hl: An @GENE_ACE @GENE_24310 @@@angiotensin-converting enzyme@@@ inhibitor, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, had an effect similar to that of @CHEMICAL_candesartan_cilexetil @CHEMICAL_MESH:C077793 @@@TCV-116@@@.

citations.NLM: Kino H, Hama J, Takenaka T, Sugimura K, Kamoi K, Shimada S, Yamamoto Y, Nagata S, Horiuchi M, Katori R. Effect of an angiotensin II receptor antagonist, TCV-116, on rat carotid artery neointimal formation after balloon injury. Blood Press Suppl. 1994;5():43-8. PMID: 7889200
